description:
goprotobuf: Several optimisations:
  - avoid allocation in dec_slice_struct.
  - store backpointer to StructProperties in Properties to avoid calls to GetProperties.
  - speed up XXX_unrecognized operations.

messages.text:
Hello adg (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf/source/detail?r=50e7de29611a ***

goprotobuf: Several optimisations:
  - avoid allocation in dec_slice_struct.
  - store backpointer to StructProperties in Properties to avoid calls to GetProperties.
  - speed up XXX_unrecognized operations.

R=adg
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6450135

subject: code review 6450135: goprotobuf: Several optimisations:
